thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bajaj Finance Says Co To Now Hold About 12.60 Pct Of Equity In Mobikwik

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bajaj Finance Says Co To Now Hold About 12.60 Pct Of Equity In Mobikwik

organizations.name: brief-bajaj finance says co to now hold about

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Bajaj Finance Ltd:
* SAYS ENTERED INTO A SUBSCRIPTION AGREEMENT WITH ONE MOBIKWIK SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED
* POST CONVERSION OF CONVERTIBLE CUMULATIVE PREFERENCE SHARES, CO WOULD HOLD ABOUT 10.83 PERCENT OF EQUITY IN MOBIKWIK
* SAYS VALUE OF TRANSACTION ENVISAGED IS ABOUT 2.25 BILLION RUPEES
* DUE TO CHANGE IN CONVERSION PRICE OF CCCPS, CO TO NOW HOLD ABOUT 12.60 PERCENT OF EQUITY IN MOBIKWIK Source text - bit.ly/2FDM0pB Further company coverage:
